SELECT SUM(COALESCE(file_file_size, ?) + COALESCE(thumbnail_file_size, ?)) FROM "media_attachments" INNER JOIN "accounts" ON "accounts"."id" = "media_attachments"."account_id" WHERE "accounts"."domain" IN (SELECT "instances"."domain" FROM "instances" WHERE (reverse(? || domain) LIKE reverse(?)))

SELECT axis.*, ( WITH new_media_attachments AS ( SELECT COALESCE(media_attachments.file_file_size, ?) + COALESCE(media_attachments.thumbnail_file_size, ?) AS size FROM media_attachments INNER JOIN accounts ON accounts.id = media_attachments.account_id WHERE date_trunc(?, media_attachments.created_at)::date = axis.period AND accounts.domain IN (SELECT domain FROM instances WHERE reverse(? || domain) LIKE reverse(? || ?::text)) ) SELECT SUM(size) FROM new_media_attachments ) AS value FROM ( SELECT generate_series(date_trunc(?, ?::timestamp)::date, date_trunc(?, ?::timestamp)::date, interval ?) AS period ) AS axis
